name: Heroes Chronicles: All Chapters
description:
Heroes Chronicles: Warlords of the Wastelands + Full Installation

RaPiMoDEBianPaKaGer
notes: Para obtener los accesos directos a las expansiones puedes hacerlo manualmente o instalarlos desde el mismo lutris, solo deberas configurarlo adecuadamente.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Heroes Chronicles/Warlords of the Wasteland/Warlords.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Heroes Chronicles/Warlords of the Wasteland/Warlords.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Heroes Chronicles/Warlords of the Wasteland/
installer:
- task:
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
